entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain beginning late this morning then changing to freezing rain or snow mixed with rain this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow mixed with rain changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
